channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Republican support for unions plunged this year
item.description: Data: Gallup ; Chart: Axios Visuals Support for labor unions among Republicans declined this year, finds a Gallup survey out Thursday morning. Why it ...

item.title: Nvidia is caught in Trump's China trade war, and it could impact the stock market
item.description: Nvidia , the biggest company in the world by market cap, reported world-beating results Wednesday evening. But export controls to China dampened its d...

item.title: Trump attacks Utah's anti-gerrymandering ruling
item.description: President Trump took to Truth Social on Wednesday afternoon to attack a Utah court ruling that ordered new Congressional maps pursuant to an anti-gerr...

item.title: What we know about the shooting at Annunciation Catholic Church
item.description: A shooter opened fire during morning Mass at a Catholic school in South Minneapolis Wednesday morning, killing two children and injuring 17 other wors...

item.title: Exclusive: Electromagnetic weapon zaps drone swarm in seconds
item.description: Waves of drones tumbled out of the sky above Camp Atterbury, Indiana, on Tuesday, their mechanical death throes punctuating what was otherwise a quiet...

item.title: White House trade adviser says India tariffs can drop if it ‘stops buying Russian oil’
item.description: Peter Navarro accused the country of funding Russia’s war in Ukraine and harming American taxpayers.

item.title: Poll: Republicans’ view of key federal agencies has improved in the last year
item.description: Republicans have a higher approval of several federal agencies under Trump than Biden, while Democrats’ approval rate has dropped.

item.title: ICE asks for access to Chicago-area Navy base to assist operations
item.description: The request followed Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem’s declaration that a “strike team” of ICE agents would arrive in Chicago soon.

item.title: Trump to hold meeting on Gaza aid efforts amid conflict and famine
item.description: U.S. Special Envoy to the Middle East and Russia Steve Witkoff blamed Hamas for holding up a truce. He projected a deal by the end of the year.

item.title: Michael Anton, longtime MAGA intellectual, to exit State Dept.
item.description: A member of President George W. Bush’s National Security Council, Anton later urged reluctant conservatives to back Donald Trump in 2016.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
